benchmark_details.name: Context is Key (CiK)
benchmark_details.overview: CiK consists of tasks designed to assess a forecasting modelâ€™s ability to use both numerical input-output pairs and essential textual context. Accurate forecasts in CiK are made possible only by effectively leveraging both numerical data and key information contained within the accompanying text.

purpose_and_intended_users.goal: The primary objective of the benchmark is to advance multimodal forecasting by promoting models that are both accurate and accessible to decision-makers with varied technical expertise.

data.source: Publicly available datasets from various application domains.
data.annotation: Manual crafting of natural language context and extensive evaluation of tasks.

metrics: Region of Interest Continuous Ranked Probability Score (RCRPS)
methodology.calculation: RCRPS is calculated to evaluate both index scores within relevant and non-relevant contexts.
methodology.interpretation: Lower RCRPS indicates better forecasting performance.
methodology.baseline_results: Various forecasting models were evaluated showing different performances on the RCRPS metric.
methodology.validation: The benchmark includes a panel review by human evaluators to assess the relevance of context in tasks.
